name: Outbreak Containment Simulation (FREE DEMO)
description:
↑ FREE DEMO ABOVE ↑  Take on the world's deadliest diseases in a numbers-driven virus outbreak simulator. Lockdown entire cities, restrict travel around the country, quarantine infected neighborhoods as you wish--you're in control--but your powers won't go unchecked. 

If you're too heavy handed you might face protests and economic ruin.  Should you focus on research or keeping social order? These are the questions you will face as your nation's fate hangs in the balance. Can you keep your country afloat until the vaccine is developed? 

Updates are coming! Request any viruses you'd like to fight, countries you'd like to control, or changes you'd like to see in the comments below and we'll try our best to add it!
